org.openntf.formula.function

Class OperatorsAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openntf.formula.impl.AtFunction
      • org.openntf.formula.function.OperatorsAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Comparators, Operators, OperatorsBool

    public abstract class OperatorsAbstract
extends AtFunction
    This class implements the default arithmetic, boolean and compare operators. As Operations are used at most, this is implemented to be (or to try to be) as fast as possible
    Author:
    Roland Praml, Foconis AG
